AI Description: Chromap is a computational tool for comprehensive and integrative analysis of chromatin modifications from multiple ChIP-seq experiments.
Core Features: Integrative Analysis Of Chromatin Modifications, Multi-Sample Chip-Seq Experiment Analysis, Statistical Analysis Of Chip-Seq Data, Visualization Of Chromatin Modification Patterns
General Tags: Chromatin Modifications, Computational Biology, Bioinformatics, Genomics
